data.title: Opposition leader Arvin Boolell has without surprise criticized the budget, calling it “misleading, electoralist, disjointed, and...
data.meta_description:
7 likes, 0 comments - 3news.info on June 8, 2024: "Opposition leader Arvin Boolell has without surprise criticized the budget, calling it “misleading, electoralist, disjointed, and disappointing.” He labeled the Minister of Finance’s exercise an “economic disaster” and accused the government of failing to address fundamental issues. Boolell pointed out that inflation continues to affect everyone, particularly the lower-income population. He criticized the government for not alleviating the burden of fuel prices and failing to support the middle class.

During a press briefing with the PTr/MMM/ND alliance, Boolell accused the government of mismanaging the economy and highlighted instances of waste, fraud, and corruption, including the BAI, Betamax, and Les Salines scandals. He suggested that a new government would restore economic confidence and better manage public resources. Additionally, he criticized the budget for ignoring key issues such as the drug problem, education, and the blue economy.".
